overview:
Ajay Kumar Meher a native of Jharsuguda, Orissa but currently staying in Bangalore is co-founder and CEO of Qlogix Solutions. Ajay has a B.Tech from Utkal University and he is a Microsoft Certified Professional. Ajay has keen interest in computers and Internet. He was introduced to the blogging world in the year 2006 when he founded a blog called I am not a geek on the blogger platform. later he moved to Wordpress.com and then self hosted Wordpress. He created his first independent blog on self-hosted Wordpress at http://techiezone.in and made it a hugely popular blog in a very short span of time.

In the mean time Ajay got an opportunity to work on LAMP stack in his day to day job and started learning php and various Open Source applications like Joomla, Wordpress, FengOffice and embraced Open Source technology. He met Himasnhu Sekhar Dash while he was working in an MNC and both of them founded Qlogix Solutions in the year 2010.
